players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I'm the mafioso. Stay wary, Alice."
You: "Bob, you've got us. Stay hidden."
Diana: "Bob, consider us allies. Share info on who you suspect."
Bob: "I'll watch you, Alice. Trust no one."
You: "Bob confessed, Diana and I are suspects. Stay alert."
Diana: "Bob, trust us. Share info on your suspicions. Alice & I will help."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Alice is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm the mafioso. Stay wary, Alice."
Alice: "Bob, you've got us. Stay hidden."
Diana: "Bob, consider us allies. Share info on who you suspect."
You: "I'll watch you, Alice. Trust no one."
Alice: "Bob confessed, Diana and I are suspects. Stay alert."
Diana: "Bob, trust us. Share info on your suspicions. Alice & I will help."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
